levers.name: China PS Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for China. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: EU 30 PS Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for EU 30. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: NAFTA PS Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for NAFTA. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: ROW PS Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in polystyrene used in packaging for rest of world. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: China Other Single Use Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in other single use packaging (other than polystyrene) in China. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: EU 30 Other Single Use Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in other single use packaging (other than polystyrene) in EU 30. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: NAFTA Other Single Use Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in other single use packaging (other than polystyrene) in NAFTA. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: ROW Other Single Use Packaging
levers.description: Percent reduction in other single use packaging (other than polystyrene) in rest of world. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: China Additives
levers.description: Percent reduction in additives in China. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: EU 30 Additives
levers.description: Percent reduction in additives in EU 30. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: NAFTA Additives
levers.description: Percent reduction in additives in NAFTA. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: ROW Additives
levers.description: Percent reduction in additives in rest of world. Use 100% for ban. Assumes more immediate policy implementation with short phase in.

levers.name: China Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in China. Assumes gradually introduced cap and compliance.

levers.name: EU 30 Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in EU 30. Assumes gradually introduced cap and compliance.

levers.name: NAFTA Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in NAFTA. Assumes gradually introduced cap and compliance.

levers.name: ROW Virgin Plastic Production Cap
levers.description: Maximum million tons of annual virgin plastic production in rest of world. Assumes gradually introduced cap and compliance.

levers.name: China Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in China. Assumes gradual increase of mandate until hitting this target.

levers.name: EU 30 Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in EU 30. Assumes gradual increase of mandate until hitting this target.

levers.name: NAFTA Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in NAFTA. Assumes gradual increase of mandate until hitting this target.

levers.name: ROW Minimum Recycled Content
levers.description: The minimum content which must come from recycyling in rest of world. Assumes gradual increase of mandate until hitting this target.

levers.name: China Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for China including both collection and processing. Assumes gradual deployment of capital and realization of benefits.

levers.name: EU 30 Recycling Investment
levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for EU 30 including both collection and processing. Assumes gradual deployment of capital and realization of benefits.

levers.description: Investment in expanded recycling infrastructure for rest of world including both collection and processing. Assumes gradual deployment of capital and realization of benefits.

levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in China. Assumes gradual phase in of mandate until reaching this target.

levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in EU 30. Assumes gradual phase in of mandate until reaching this target.

levers.name: NAFTA Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in NAFTA. Assumes gradual phase in of mandate until reaching this target.

levers.name: ROW Min Recycling Rate
levers.description: The minumum recycling rate for waste in rest of world. Assumes gradual phase in of mandate until reaching this target.

levers.name: China Packaging Consumption Tax
levers.description: The amount of tax per article imposed as a consumption tax in China. Assumes this is a more immediate policy with short phase in.

levers.name: China Packaging Tax Power
levers.description: In China, what should the power be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is a in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: China Packaging Tax Multiplier
levers.description: In China, what should the multiplier be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is b in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: EU 30 Packaging Tax Power
levers.description: In EU 30, what should the power be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is a in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: EU 30 Packaging Tax Multiplier
levers.description: In EU 30, what should the multiplier be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is b in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: NAFTA Packaging Tax Power
levers.description: In NAFTA, what should the power be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is a in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: NAFTA Packaging Tax Multiplier
levers.description: In NAFTA, what should the multiplier be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is b in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: RoW Packaging Tax Power
levers.description: In rest of world, what should the power be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is a in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: RoW Packaging Tax Multiplier
levers.description: In rest of world, what should the multiplier be for the curve that describes the relationship between taxation level and reduction in consumption. This is b in consumption change = (tax)^a * b.

levers.name: Policy Start Year
levers.description: Year in which policies start having an effect.

levers.name: Immediate Policy Complete Year
levers.description: At what year the phase in of bans and taxes would be complete. This includes time for compliance.

levers.name: Gradual Policy Complete Year
levers.description: At what year the phase in of policies other than bans and taxes such as investment or rate / content mandates would be complete. This includes time for compliance.

levers.name: China Recycling Yield Loss
levers.description: How much of recycling is lost before it is recirculated into new products in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Recycling Yield Loss
levers.description: How much of recycling is lost before it is recirculated into new products in the EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Recycling Yield Loss
levers.description: How much of recycling is lost before it is recirculated into new products in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Recycling Yield Loss
levers.description: How much of recycling is lost before it is recirculated into new products in rest of world.

levers.name: Recycling Circularity Delay
levers.description: How long it takes from recycling collection to use in new products for newly added or removed recycling.

levers.name: Recycling Displacement Rate
levers.description: How much of virgin plastic production is reduced or displaced by newly available recycled material.

levers.name: Recycling Lost Virgin Backfill Rate
levers.description: At what rate a reduction in virgin plastic production is replaced by increased recycling.

levers.name: Recycling Content Lost Consumption
levers.description: At what rate consumption goes down due to price increase caused by increased minium recycled material.

levers.name: China Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in China.

levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Incineration Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new incineration capacity would go to plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: China Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in China.

levers.name: EU 30 Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in EU 30.

levers.name: NAFTA Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in NAFTA.

levers.name: ROW Landfill Plastic Percent
levers.description: What percent of new landfill capacity would go to plastics in rest of world.

levers.name: Packaging Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before packaging products become waste on average for newly added or removed packaging plastic products.

levers.name: Construction Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before construction products become waste on average for newly added or removed construction plastic products.

levers.name: Textile Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before textile products become waste on average for newly added or removed textile plastic products.

levers.name: HLS Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before household, leisure, sports products become waste on average for newly added or removed HLS plastic products.

levers.name: Electronic Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before electronic products become waste on average for newly added or removed electronic plastic products.

levers.name: Transporation Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before transporation products become waste on average for newly added or removed transportation plastic products.

levers.name: Agriculture Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before agriculture products become waste on average for newly added or removed agriculture plastic products.

levers.name: Other Lifetime
levers.description: The number of years before other products become waste on average for newly added or removed other plastic products.
